title: Mental Health Technician Trainee
company: State of Illinois - Department of Human Services
location: Kiley Developmental Center, 1401 W Dugdale Rd, Waukegan, IL 60085
description: For a period from six and not to exceed twelve months, receive instruction and training in providing care for individuals with developmental disabilities. Attends formal classes for instruction in routine nursing practices and techniques, behavior intervention skill development and to gain elementary understanding of the causes, nature and treatment of intellectual disabilities. Performs routine tasks in providing care for individuals with developmental disabilities, including conducting activities and programs, documenting data regarding the individual's response to care and programs and escorting individuals to participate in the receipt of community services. Travels in performance of job duties.
qualifications: Knowledge, skill, and mental development equivalent to completion of high school
requirements: Ability to lift up to 50 pounds
Ability to physically restrain individuals as necessary
Ability to work after business hours, weekends, and holidays
Ability to utilize office equipment, including personal computers
Ability to pass the IDHS background check
Ability to pass a drug screen for drugs prohibited from recreational use under Illinois Law
